# Chain

**A React web3 toolkit for building accessible and performant applications.**

ðŸ”¶ This is a work in progress therefore the API may change. Please bare with us during this period. ðŸ”¶

## Getting Started

``` bash
npm install chain

OR

yarn add chain
```
